Key Match Events: Benin equalizes the score with a great goal from their attacking leader Mounié with a great volley after a cross from the left flank.
Goal by Al Badri converts the penalty kick and scores the first goal of the match.
Yellow card for Libya's midfielder Shafshuf for a recklessness in the dispute with the ball.
Pre-Game Insights: Benin and Libya are in Group D of the African Cup of Nations qualifiers.
Benin already played and lost its first match, when it faced the group's favorite, Nigeria.
Libya had not played their first match at the time of the article.
Post-Match Reflections: Details about post-match events or comments are not provided in the article.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is being played at the Stade Félix Houphouët Boigny located in the country of Ivory Coast.
The match is part of the CAF Qualifiers road to African Cup of Nations.
Others: The article does not provide any other significant mentions beyond the categories listed.
